name: Boom Boom Hakotaro! (Prototype)
description:
This is still very much a prototype, but I just needed to release what I had.

There's only one level and it's probably too hard, so... have fun.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys/Left stick: Move

Spacebar/Z key/A button: Jump

Left click/X key/X button: Boom boom

Game based on Hololive. Follow Hakos Baelz.
